text.section: A majority of the authorized membership of the Board is a quorum.
The Board shall determine the times and places of its meetings and hearings.

A member of the Board:
may not receive compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

section.section: The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
The Board may require the staff to be covered by a surety bond in the form and amount required by law.
